selections.name: Louisiana Wildlife
selections.reason: Possesses a high speed figure of 97 and draws the rail. Coming off a strong 2nd place finish and fits the 'Lone Speed/Presser' profile in a field depleted by scratches.

selections.name: Custom Cadillac
selections.reason: Consistent runner with a 98 speed figure. Finished 2nd last out and projects to sit a perfect stalking trip just off the rail horse.

selections.name: Righteous Freedom
selections.reason: Holds the highest recent speed figure (99). Finished 3rd last time out and is a logical contender if the top two falter.

selections.name: Sir Mack
selections.reason: Speed figure of 91 puts him in the mix for exotics, though a step below the top trio on raw numbers.

danger_horse.name: Custom Cadillac
danger_horse.reason: Very consistent speed figures (98) matching the top pick; could easily turn the tables with the right trip.

selections.name: You're In Heaven
selections.reason: Dominant last-out winner by 6 lengths with a 99 speed figure. Dallas Stewart/Axel Concepcion combination is lethal here.

selections.name: Bartender
selections.reason: Brad Cox trainee with Jareth Loveberry aboard. Consistent form (Speed 89) and represents the class of the field outside the favorite.

selections.name: Hurricane Kate
selections.reason: Solid 2nd place finish in Allowance company last out. Speed figure (82) is lower but consistency makes her a board hitter.

selections.name: Sticker Shocked
selections.reason: McPeek/Ortiz connection demands respect, though recent form (9th) requires a turnaround.

selections.name: Spoke
selections.reason: Boasts a massive 113 speed figure, significantly higher than the field average. If he runs back to that number, he wins.

selections.name: Fit To Fly
selections.reason: Consistent turf sprinter with a 106 speed figure. Draws the rail which is advantageous for saving ground in turf sprints.

selections.name: One True Gentleman
selections.reason: Gets a massive jockey upgrade to Jose Ortiz. Speed figure of 106 puts him right in the mix.

selections.name: Clarestown
selections.reason: Solid speed figure of 100 and Mitchell Murrill is a strong turf rider at FG.

danger_horse.name: One True Gentleman
danger_horse.reason: The jockey switch to Ortiz signals intent and the horse has the back class to upset.

selections.name: Mo Smoking
selections.reason: Highest recent speed figure (92) in a weak field. Drops slightly in class/maintains level and looks best on paper.

selections.name: Strawberry Sundae
selections.reason: Morning line favorite (5/2) with Isaac Castillo. Consistent runner (Speed 90) who will be pressing the pace.

selections.name: Fret No More
selections.reason: Paco Lopez takes the mount. Speed 86 is competitive here.

selections.name: Steal Me Over
selections.reason: Speed 91 is competitive, but rail draw in a route can be tricky for a horse that needs to rally.

danger_horse.name: Strawberry Sundae
danger_horse.reason: Likely favorite who could control the pace if allowed.

selections.name: Ketchum
selections.reason: Won last out with a 108 speed figure. Loveberry/Block combo is high percentage. The horse to beat.

selections.name: Rude Procedure
selections.reason: Norm Casse and Jose Ortiz team up. Matches the top pick with a 108 speed figure potential. Classy runner.

selections.name: Dr. My Eyes
selections.reason: Listed with a massive 112 speed figure in the header stats. Won maiden last out. High upside.

selections.name: Archimedes
selections.reason: Speed 102 is respectable. Finished 3rd last out and could pick up pieces.

danger_horse.name: Rude Procedure
danger_horse.reason: Elite connections and speed figures make him a co-favorite on paper.

selections.name: Sully
selections.reason: Massive class drop from MSW to Maiden Claiming $30k. Speed figure of 110 towers over this field. Jose Ortiz rides. The standout of the day.

selections.name: Where Y'at
selections.reason: Speed 107 is the only one close to the top pick. Axel Concepcion aboard. Clear second best.

selections.name: Prince Ben
selections.reason: Speed 99. Consistent enough to hit the board underneath the top two.

selections.name: Somekinda Mischief
selections.reason: Speed 98. Pedroza rides. Exotic filler.

selections.name: Big Chopper
selections.reason: Value Play. Highest speed figure in the race (109) and offers 6/1 odds. Hernandez/Gelner team is solid.

selections.name: Pegaso
selections.reason: Morning line favorite (5/2) with consistent 100 speed figures. Will be running late.

selections.name: Fran's Star
selections.reason: Speed 102. Paco Lopez aboard. Consistent turf performer.

selections.name: Dapper Moon
selections.reason: Speed 105. Concepcion/Stewart. Dangerous speed/stalking type.

danger_horse.name: Pegaso
danger_horse.reason: The public choice, but speed figures suggest he is vulnerable to #3.

selections.name: Sono
selections.reason: Top speed figure of 102 in the field. Loveberry rides. Outside post is favorable for a clean trip.

selections.name: Twofexusnexus
selections.reason: Jose Ortiz and Joe Sharp team up. Speed 98. Very dangerous connections play.

selections.name: Drewmazing
selections.reason: Speed 99. Outside draw. Good value at 10/1.

selections.name: Sonofaship
selections.reason: Speed 96. Consistent check earner.

danger_horse.name: Twofexusnexus
danger_horse.reason: High percentage trainer/jockey combo often overperforms odds.
